Text: RE Morgan Stanley Cc Paul You can only imagine how disgusting things are over here with the media circus I guess being in London I dont have to tell you about media circuses Hopefully well all be able to get through this and move on to bigger and better things Im passing your email along to Susan Bailey as I dont have any involvement in the day to day old Enron business Hopefully Susan will be able to help you Take care Marie Original Message From Simons Paul Sent Monday February AM To Heard Marie Cc Crilly Peter Subject Morgan Stanley Importance High Marie I hope you dealing with the sudden fame notoriety in the US Have you got any master agreements or other netting agreements in the US between Morgan Stanley Capital Group Inc and ECTRIC Enron Capital Trade Resources Inc If so please fax me a copy and email me to say its on its way Thanks a lot Paul
FW mouse You sexy thingOriginal Message From Fitzgerald Genia Sent Wednesday January PM To Heard Marie Denton Rhonda L Subject FW mouse You sexy thing Mousefinalmpeg

The Chase Manhattan BankWe have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of September between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment i amends the definition of Specified Swap to include foreign exchange spot or foreign exchange forward transactions or currency option transactions ii to specify that The Chase Manhattan Bank is a Multibranch Party and may act through any Office specified in a confirmation and ii to add a Scope of the Agreement provision which states that if the parties enter into a Specified Swap as defined in the master agreement such Specified Swap shall be subject to governed by and construed in accordance with the terms of the agreement unless the confirmation relating thereto specifically states to the contrary In addition we have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of November between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment replaces the definitions of Settlement Amount and Loss as set forth in the master agreement Copies will be distributed

Morgan Stanley Capital Group IncWe have received an executed Fourth Amendment to Master Energy Price Swap Agreement dated as of October between Enron North America Corp and Morgan Stanley Capital Group Inc which amends the definition of Exposure Threshold Copies will be distributed

Bank of America NAWe have received an executed Second Amendment to ISDA Master Agreement dated as of October between Bank of America NA and Enron North America Corp which amendment amends the Part cii of the Schedule which states that Bank of America is a multibranch party and may act through the Offices set forth on Appendix A Amendments Copies will be distributed

Amerada Hess CorporationWe have received the following financial Master Agreement Type of Contract ISDA Master Agreement MulticurrencyCross Border Effective Date November Enron Entity Enron North America Corp Counterparty Amerada Hess Corporation Transactions Covered Approved for all products with the exception of Foreign Exchange Confirming Entity Enron North America Corp Governing Law New York Special Handling Requirement Counterparty has five Local Business Days after a confirmation was received by it to accept or dispute a confirmation Copies will be distributed

FW Intercompany trading contractsSusan Kay asked me to forward this to you Marie Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Wednesday January PM To Heard Marie Panus Stephanie Fitzgerald Genia Jones Tana Hill Robin Cc Tweed Sheila Clark Barton Subject Intercompany trading contracts Ive been tasked with trying to get a handle on intercompany trading contracts What would be the most efficient way of coming up with a list Thanks Kay

Brokerage Agreement Memo Cc Pursuant to Sara Shackletons request I am attaching a memo that I prepared in April regarding procedures for opening brokerage accounts Please do not hesitate to contact either Sara at x or me with any questions Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Marie nroncom

Deemed ISDAsHi Bianca Francisco Pinto Leite has asked me to give him a list of all outstanding ISDAs and Deemed ISDAs with Mexican counterparties Can you send me a list of the Deemed ISDAs that are still outstanding either comments received or counterparty has not returned signed copy Thanks Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Marie nroncom

Message from Carol St ClairMaster Netting Group I just want to personally thank all of you for all of your hard work the past few weeks in addressing our counterparties requests for Master Netting Agreements We have been able to sign up a number of them as a result of your efforts and have managed to keep certain counterparties from cutting us off in trading Thanks again for your efforts and for putting up with one fire drill after another Hopefully we all learned alot in the process Carol St Clair EB phone fax cell phone pager home fax
Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsUpdated list of master netting agreement assignments
Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsAttached is the updated list
Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsAttached is the updated list of master netting agreement assignments

Master Netting AgreementsPer Carol St Clair at this time there is no urgency in finalizing and executing any master netting agreements No master netting agreement should be signed without Bill Bradfords or Louise Kitchens prior approval If any questions please contact either Carol or Elizabeth Sager Thanks Marie
Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsAttached is the current list of master netting agreement assignments We will circulate a revised list periodically

FW Master Netting Agreements ReminderPlease see Elizabeths email below Original Message From Sager Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Heard Marie Subject Master Netting Agreements Reminder Reminder If you are working on a Master Netting Agreement you also need to understand what type of entities are being included in the netted group On the power side there are regulatory restrictions on a regulated utility from becoming a guarantor of the debts of unregulated companies accordingly an MNA with a regulated utility and other unaffiliated parties on its side will not work particularly if you are posting collateral on a fully netted basis In this case the only option would be to keep the underlying margining agreements in place no new global collateral annex and have the MNA only be a cross default and acceleration and possible setoff just in case the money is going the right way andor just in case it works Mary is working on a new draft of the MNA to be used if we are not superceding the underlying margining terms Thanks Elizabeth Sager

RE AlleghenyBoy Im REALLY mad at you Just kidding I thought you were just going to initial the signature pages and then we would get Kevin to sign it here Since youre in town I can run the originals down to you if youll tell me where you are so that you can initial and then I can ask Kevin to sign Thanks Marie Original Message From Ngo Tracy Sent Tuesday August PM To Heard Marie Cc Shackleton Sara Subject RE Allegheny Marie Dont be mad I have not gotten it signed When I was ready to do so Belden was unreachable Then I suddenly forgot prior to rushing down to Htown What do you want me to do now Get Kevin this week or Get Tim on Tues after Labor Day Are you really mad Im sorry Please advise on how I can try and do damage control Tracy Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday August PM To Ngo Tracy Subject Allegheny Hi Tracy I have never received the signature pages for the Allegheny ISDA Have you sent them Mare

RE Timesheets are DueHere are my exceptions vacation sick vacation Thanks Original Message From Keiser Holly Sent Thursday August AM To Bailey Susan Boyd Samantha Cook Mary Farrell Keegan Gonzalez Esmeralda Greenberg Mark Heard Marie Hendry Brent Jones Tana Keiser Holly Koehler Anne C Leite Francisco Pinto Nelson Cheryl Panus Stephanie Sayre Frank Shackleton Sara Spencer Becky St Clair Carol Taylor Mark E Legal Subject Timesheets are Due Just a reminder timesheets will be due tomorrow Friday August Please let me know your exception time for pay period August Thanks Holly Keiser Enron Wholesale Services Legal Department Phone Fax Location EB

FW Enron North America Coastal States Trading Inc ISDA Veronica Heres the Coastal States Trading Incs ISDA Marie Original Message From Cooper Chris Chris lPasocomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESCooperCChrisCChrisECooperElPasoEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Heard Marie Cc Shuttee John Subject Enron North America Coastal States Trading Inc ISDA Hello Marie per our conversation this morning please find attached Coastal States Trading Incs standard schedules along with a copy of our guaranty format We prefer to make proposed changes directly on the electronic versionas opposed to hard copy Please redline the schedule on the PC put a draft date in the upper right hand corner of the first page of both schedules then email the schedules back to John Shuttee for review John will handle all negotiations for this ISDA He can be reached at or Thanks for attention to this matter CKC Coastal Guaranty Format updatedoc ISDA CST CSA Schedule doc ISDA CST Master Schedule doc This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender Coastal Guaranty Format updatedoc ISDA CST CSA Schedule doc ISDA CST Master Schedule doc
Corporate CertificatesCarol Attached are the ENAEnron Corp certificates I was just going to work off these forms when or if EBS ever executed an ISDA

RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Cc credit Martha Thanks for getting the changes to the form of guaranty approved Will you please have the guaranty dated effective as of January Also who will be the party signing the guaranty and when can we expect to receive the signed guaranty In addition when the guaranty has been signed on your part will you please fax a copy to me at Again thank you for your assistance on this Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Tuesday September PM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Marie Our Corporate Lawyers just agreed to your suggested addition to the Recitals Section In order to be able to execute the Guaranty we need the final blessing of Hacienda which should be no problem and is already in process Carlos Riveroll contacting you to reach an agreement regarding the Amendment to the MSA to incorporate the Guaranty In the mean time we will prepare the execution copyes be ready to sign it Best regards Martha Navarro Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Viernes de Septiembre de pm To IMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom Cc CraigBreslau LucyOrtiz Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Ms Navarro Thank you for sending your comments to the guaranty Please note our comments below Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday September AM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject Pemex Guaranty Enron Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Heard Marie Because i it is a correct statement and ii it clarifies the element of consideration which is essential for purposes of enforceability Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Heard Marie We are okay with this change Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan Heard Marie We are okay with the exclusive jurisdiction The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT File WINMAILDAT This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you WINMAILDAT File WINMAILDAT

FW Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract Cc Tracy Can you prepare this guaranty for Pat Leahy The EBS entity will be Enron Broadband Services AsiaPacific Pte Ltd As you can see from the emails below they need this guaranty today Thanks Marie Original Message From Suttle John Sent Wednesday August PM To Leahy Patrick Heard Marie Cc Minns David Subject RE Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract I am fine providing this guaranty MM as I understand it Call if you have any questions Thanks John Original Message From Leahy Patrick Sent Thursday August AM To Heard Marie Cc Suttle John Minns David Subject RE Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract Thanks Marie Ill have John email you as soon as he gets in but Optus is rated A and is about to be taken over by SingTel which is AAA Pat Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Thursday August AM To Leahy Patrick Cc Suttle John Minns David Subject RE Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract Is John Suttle okay with our providing this guaranty and in this amount Also are you signing a master agreement or a short form confirmation I dont know if we can get this guaranty on such short notice but well try Marie Original Message From Leahy Patrick Sent Wednesday August AM To Heard Marie Cc Minns David Subject FW Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract I forgot to mention that the legal name of the company is Optus Networks Pty Limited Miller Street North Sydney NSW ACN Thanks Pat Original Message From Minns David Sent Wednesday August PM To Leahy Patrick Heard Marie Cc Rossi Robbi Hicks Michelle Cohagan Fred Subject RE Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract marie I suspect that would it probably cause problems to put a provision to review the value of the guaranty in the actual guaranty document It would be fine to stick with the standard guaranty wording We will sort something out with them here regarding a process to review of the value of the guaranty Original Message From Leahy Patrick Sent Wednesday August PM To Heard Marie Cc Minns David Rossi Robbi Hicks Michelle Cohagan Fred Subject Enron Corp Guarantee for Optus contract Marie Were down to the last item on signing a contract with Optus which would allow us to buy capacity from them in order to fill the circuit we sold to Uecomm associated w the MSA Theyve requested a US million parent guarantee from Enron Corp I dont know if this is standard but they would like us to include some language that says we could review the amount in the future if needed But dont worry about this if it would slow things down Could you please arrange for a guarantee from Enron Corp How long does it take would it be possible to do it today Wednesday If we can get the guarantee and the contract executed by Thursday Optus will have the circuit ready on Friday which is when our Customer needs it If you need any clarification please feel free to call David Minns or me at any time My home number is Thanks Pat Patrick M Leahy Enron Broadband Services Global Wholesale Services Asia Pacific tel fax

FW Pemex Guaranty EnronFYI Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday September AM To Heard Marie Subject RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Marie Pemex will by signing the guaranty that will be either Juan Jos Suarez CFO or Jorge Lanz Managing Director of Finance They will be able to sign it once we get the final blessing from the Ministry of Finance they have to confirm that the guaranty does not represent contingent public debt and therefore it does not require registration with Hacienda We are checking everyday to make this happen as soon as possible The guaranty cannot be dated as of January as we got the authorization from the Board in July this year and we also need this confirmatin from Hacienda to be prior to its execution As soon as we have it signed I will send you a fax and the hard copy will follow I will keep you posted Martha Original Message From MarieHeard mailto Sent Jueves de Septiembre de am To Martha NavarroMaldonado RE Power transmission curves Cc I think I received this email in error I am in the Legalfinancial trading group Marie Original Message From Danilov Viacheslav Sent Monday October AM To Williams Matthew D Hewitt Kirstee Heard Marie Cc Karabatsos Anastasia Subject FW Power transmission curves guys I know that Nick is working on something like this Please could you provide your view on whether we are expected to provide sign offs for the methodology many thanks Slava Original Message From Karabatsos Anastasia Sent October To Evans Coralie Danilov Viacheslav Cc Nath Tani Subject Power transmission curves CoralieSlava We had a meeting with Matt Kernot on Friday about SMBP SMSP RCRC curves for UK power These are due to go live in the near term if they havent already The team is using various scalars to create HH curve if needed I was wondering if anyone in Risk or Research had looked at the validity of the curves and scalars and if RiskResearch is expected to sign off on these

RE Torch assignmentDiane We just sent drafts to Torch as they needed to send them to UOM Dynegy and Sempra for review When we get them signed Ill distribute copies Marie Original Message From Anderson Diane Sent Monday October PM To Heard Marie Subject Torch assignment Hey Marie Got the Torch assignments you sent down Thanks Question for you Did someone from ENA sign all the Assignment and Assumption Agreements before you sent them to Torch the copies I have arent signed Or do we sign them when they come back executed by Torch Thanks Diane
Vacation Day Cc Mark I would like to schedule this Friday as a vacation day Please let me know if this presents a problem Thanks Marie

RE MERCATOR ENERGY INCORPORATED and ENERGY WEST INCORPORATEDHi Georgi We have an entry in our database that states that Energy West Incorporated did not change its name to Mercator Energy Incorporated There are two companies with the same name and this one is not the one that changed its name Our Energy West Incorporated is a Montana corporation The one that changed its name is a Colorado corporation Let me know if this is confusing Marie Original Message From Landau Georgi Sent Monday October PM To Bailey Susan Boyd Samantha Heard Marie Jones Tana Panus Stephanie Subject MERCATOR ENERGY INCORPORATED and ENERGY WEST INCORPORATED Importance High Please check your records and let me know if you have any kind of documentation evidencing a merger indicating that Mercator Energy Incorporated merged with and into Energy West Incorporated I am unable to find anything to substantiate this information Thanks for your help Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

CatequilHi Diane In your spare time HA HA will you check and let me know the earliest outstanding trade dates for the following counterparties Catequil Overseas Partners Ltd Catequil Partners LP They are ready to sign the ISDAs Thanks Marie

RE GEYou barely escaped our wrath this time but theres always the next Original Message From Williams Jason R Credit Sent Thursday August AM To Heard Marie Sayre Frank Subject GE Importance High Marie Frank File General Electric ISDA xls Here it is at long last Please dont beat me JRW
Review of commentsHi Todd Believe it or not I am working on our comments to the ISDA and hope to have them to you this week If I see we wont get them to you this week Ill let you know Thanks Marie

RE Master ISDA and Credit Support AnnexHi Brian The ISDA is being faxed to you now Marie Original Message From Brian XU NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBrianEKerriganTXUEcom NRONcom Sent Monday October PM To Heard Marie Subject Master ISDA and Credit Support Annex Marie I would appreciate you sending me a copy of the Master ISDA Agreement and associated Credit Support Annex between Enron and TXU The Agreement is dated October between Enron and Enserch TXU acquired Enserch approximately yrs ago If you have any questions please call me at If you could fax me a copy of it at I would appreciate it Thanks again for your assistance

Enron Corp Guaranties in favor of Catequil Partners LP and Catequil Overseas Partners LtdCindy Attached are forms of Enron Corp guaranties and related certificates to be issued in connection with ISDA Master Agreements between ENA and Catequil Partners LP and ENA and Catequil Overseas Partners Ltd Please let me know when the attached documents are ready and Ill arrange for pick up Thanks Marie

RE City of GlendaleSara I do not see a copy of an opinion in the file nor have we received one since I sent the execution copies of the ISDA to Steve Lins Marie Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Monday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Cc Heard Marie Subject RE City of Glendale Kim Can you obtain the name of Glendales bond counsel lawyers name phone number email etc Thanks SS Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Friday October PM To Shackleton Sara Subject City of Glendale Sara Believe it or not we are very close getting our signed ISDA from the City of Glendale Steve Lins the City attorney had a couple of questions which I will attempt to relay without having a copy of the documents I am assuming that he obtained a for legal opinion letter or document of some sort This document references a confirmation and we are not sure what this references Typically it references a transaction which in this case there are no transactions yet He feels this reference should be deleted What is your opinion regarding this Shackleton Sara If we have no transaction on the books then he can delete the reference Marie Have we received an opinion from Glendale We sent him a couple of form documents to facilitate the documents required under the ISDA One form ws a form resolution They have already received City Council approval to enter into financial tranactions and to enter into an ISDA with us Steve is going to get a certified copy of this Resolution Will this suffice Shackleton Sara Ill review their resolution again If it references our ISDA and all transactions it should be fine This is part of the reason why we need a legal opinion When you return I may try to do one last conference call to alleviate any unanswered questions I think we will have an executed ISDA with the City of Glendale by the end of next week I am going to be out there meeting with them on Wednesday Thanks for your help Kim

FW This is hilariousThis is cute Original Message From Heard Anne Anne yderScottcomENRON Sent Thursday October PM To Heard Marie GENIA HEARD Email Subject FW This is hilarious Original Message From Julia Lemon mailtoJulia algaryRyderScottcom Sent Thursday October AM To Annette Soane Email Charlotte Tory Email Dianne Email Judy Email Linda Manner Email Pat DaunaisBrown Email Anne Heard Irma Marsh Subject FW This is hilarious This is wonderful Hope you all get a great chuckle out of it Take all American women who are within five years of menopause train us for a few weeks outfit us with automatic weapons grenades gas masks moisturizer with SPF Prozac hormones chocolate and canned tuna drop us parachuted preferably across the landscape of Afghanistan and let us do what comes naturally Think about it Our anger quotient alone even when doing standard stuff like grocery shopping and paying bills is formidable enough to make evenarmed men in turbans tremble Weve had our children we would gladly suffer or die to protect them and their future Wed like to get away from our husbands if they havent left already And for those of us who are single the prospect of finding a good man with whom to share life is about as likely as being struck by lightning We have nothing to lose Weve survived the water diet the protein diet the carbohydrate diet and the grapefruit diet in gyms and saunas across America and never lost a pound We can easily survive months in the hostile terrain of Afghanistan with no food at all Weve spent years tracking down our husbands or lovers in bars hardware stores or sporting eventsfinding bin Laden in some cave will be no problem Uniting all the warring tribes of Afghanistan in a new government Oh please weve planned the seating arrangements for inlaws and extended families at Thanksgiving dinners for years we understand tribal warfar e Between us weve divorced enough husbands to know every trick there is for how they hide launder or cover up bank accounts and money sources We know how to find that money and we know how to seize it with or without the governments help Let us go and fight The Taliban hates women Imagine their terror as we crawl like ants with hotflashes over their godforsaken terrain Im going to write my Congresswoman You should too

To Cc Boyd Samantha Shackleton Sara Ozcan Banu Subject FW AEGIS Confidentiality Agreement I am attaching a revised Confidentiality Agreement modifying the agreement to cover both parties I have also Smith Street Houston Texas Phone Fax Original Message From Byrne Stephen ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESByrneCStephenCStephenByrneaegislimitedEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday June AM To Shackleton Sara Bailey Susan Cc Bertrand Ronald S Subject AEGIS Confidentiality Agreement I have been assisting Ron Bertrand in reviewing the proposed Confidentiality Agreement between Enron and AEGIS The original proposal was for a confidentiality agreement running to the benefit of AEGIS A subsequent comment from Sara Shackelton however indicates that a twoway agreement is necessary As such there are several issues clauses that must be included to address issues unique to underwriting insurance Specifically a confidential information supplied in order to induce AEGIS to underwrite an insurance policy must be warranted as in any insurance application b AEGIS needs the right to share such information with reinsurers who can be held to a confidentiality agreement and c if a policy is purchased AEGIS need to retain the information in case there are any enforcement disputes that might turn on the application information The AEGIS standard confidentiality agreement used in underwriting situations is attached With regard to the revised draft of June nd I note in addition to the issues mentioned above that the governing law provision is somewhat contradictory to the arbitration provisions and that the assumption in section that confidentiality provisions will be incorporated in to the definitive agreement is usually not true for insurance policies Please feel free to contact me directly to conclude this matter underwritingDOC underwritingDOC

Independent Amount languageA Independent Amount means with respect to a party the amount specified as such for that party in each Confirmation or if no amount is specified zero A Independent Amount means with respect to Party A the amount specified as such for Party A in each Confirmation or if no amount is specified zero and means with respect to Party B the amount calculated as follows on any Business Day Party A shall have the right to adjust the Independent Amount due from Party B due to changes in the volatility of relevant markets or of Party Bs portfolio of transactions with Party A Party Bs Portfolio Party A will calculate such Independent Amount based on its internal Value at Risk VAR calculation for up to ten days of VAR with respect to Party Bs Portfolio provided however that in no event shall Party Bs Independent Amount be less than if there are any outstanding transactions

FW Three new additions to the worldTana Heres info on the Elliotts Marie Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Wednesday July AM To Elliott Mark Subject RE Three new additions to the world CONGRATULATIONS Weve been asking everyday if anyone had heard if the Babies Elliott had arrived Glad to hear that they are all healthy and were a good size and that Mom is doing well Look forward to seeing pictures of the little ones I know you all are going to have so much fun with them Hope youve been storing up sleep cause it looks like you wont be getting much for a while Again congratulations These three little ones dont realize how lucky they are to have such a nice Dad but Im sure theyll find out soon Take care Marie Original Message From Elliott Mark Sent Wednesday July AM To Hodge Jeffrey T Taylor Mark E Legal St Clair Carol Jones Tana Heard Marie Aronowitz Alan Haedicke Mark E Subject Three new additions to the world Ladies and gentlemen This is just to let you know that Emma gave birth at week on Friday th July to our triplets Benjamin James at pm lbs ozs Toby William pm lbs Hannah May pm lbs ozs Although small they are all fully functioning and very well they are in the lowest level of special care and they will probably be in there for another two to four weeks until they can feed properly and maintain their weights Emma is fine too very well All the best and kind regards Mark

FW isda commentsHere are XTOs comments Please respond to those that are credit related which appear to be most of them Lucky you Thanks Marie Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAdamFAutenxtoenergyEcom NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Heard Marie Cc Subject isda comments Ms Heard As we discussed the following are our comments to the ISDA Master Agreement that you sent to Terry Schultz on May General Our name has changed from Cross Timbers Oil Company to XTO Energy Inc a Delaware corporation Schedule to the Master Agreement Part We would incorporate the same language for Party B as applies to Party A with regard to the delivery of financial statements Our website address is wwwxtoenergycom Propose that for both parties strike the time requirement for sending financials in the event not available online ie in no event later than X days after the end of the X days following X period Part g We like to strike or otherwise from line and line Credit Support Annex Threshold needs to be updated for Party B to million This is consistent with the threshold levels indicated in a letter from Jason Williams dated January Material Adverse Change for Party B we would suggest that the definition be rewritten so that if our credit rating with SP falls below B that would be a MAC a two notch downgrade and consistent with the change for Party A In connection with this change we would propose striking the financial covenant tests i ii This would also apply under the Eligibility to Hold Posted Collateral section As a matter of form this would permit us to strike the definitions of EBITDA and EBITDA Coverage Ratio Wed like to remove Schedule showing the form of letter of credit This is not consistent with our currently issued letter of credit the terms of which have been accepted by Enron Wed like to propose that the limit on the Enron guaranty to XTO Energy be increased from mm to mm to give us a little more flexibility for future deals QuestionsClarifications Could you comment as to why under Part e of the Schedule to the Master Lease you have selected to use the Loss as opposed to the Market Quotation method We have no other ISDAs with this calculation method Under the Schedule to the Master Lease what is the rationale for Part f Netting of Payments We found this a little murky Please call me at if you have any questions about this comments Thanks very much Regards Adam Auten Assistant Treasurer XTO Energy Inc

FW Southern Company ISDA Master AgreementsI just received this email from Todd Perkins at Southern Co Original Message From Perkins Todd A ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPerkinsCToddAECTAPERKINsoutherncoEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday August AM To Heard Marie Subject Southern Company ISDA Master Agreements We have been working on ISDAs with you for several of our subsidiaries Georgia Power Company Mississippi Power Company Gulf Power Company and Savannah Electric and Power Company Up to this point we have wanted to execute an ISDA for each of these companies Due to the way in which we operate our generation assets as a single system we have decided that we need to change the way in which we enter these ISDAs We would like to execute a single ISDA with you that includes six of our subsidiaries This is how we have entered some of our physical trading contracts In this arrangement the counterparty on Southerns side would be listed as Southern Company Services Inc as agent for Alabama Power Company Georgia Power Company Gulf Power Company Mississippi Power Company Savannah Electric and Power Company and Southern Power Company By using this approach we have more flexibility in entering trades and it provides even stronger credit protection for you since all six of these companies are on the hook Probably the best way to proceed is for you to forward your comments back to me from the last draft I sent to you I will then make the changes to reflect this approach described above and send back to you I look forward to receiving your comments back Please give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Todd A Perkins Original Message From Perkins Todd A Sent Friday July AM To Heard Marie Subject RE Draft ISDA Master Agreements Here are the ISDA Schedules for Georgia Power Mississippi Power and Savannah Electric with our comments Please let me know when you are ready to discuss Todd Perkins Southern Company File Enron Georgia ISDA Scheduledoc File Enron Mississippi ISDA Scheduledoc File Enron Savannah ISDA Scheduledoc Original Message From Heard Marie SMTP Sent Thursday July AM To Subject FW Draft ISDA Master Agreements Hope this reaches you this time Marie Original FW Assistance for Dogs in NY and Washington DCOriginal Message From Heard Anne Anne yderScottcomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESHeardCAnneCAnneFHeardRyderScottEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Heard Marie RITAS HEARD Email Subject FW Assistance for Dogs in NY and Washington DC Original Message From Espey Molly Sent Friday September PM To Heard Anne Schiro Debby Robertson Barbara DeFork Susan Subject FW Assistance for Dogs in NY and Washington DC Original Message From Three Dog Bakery mailto Sent Friday September PM To Subject Assistance for Dogs in NY and Washington DC Dear Dog Loving Friends We hope this letter finds its way to you and to your hearts Like the rest of the nation weve watched the events unfolding in NYC and Washington DC with disbelief with horror with sorrow Unfortunately so often during a crisis our loved pets can be forgotten or unintentionally left to fend for themselves Can you help us help them We are getting supplies of food treats and dog boots for the rescue dogs who need nourishment and protection for their paws while they work The rubble and steel can destroy and infect the pads of a dogs paw rendering them useless in their rescue work The search dogs are working so hard to locate and save human lives that they are wearing through their boots at a rapid pace We want to be sure they are protected Supplies of food and treats will also be donated to displaced dogs and other pets whose owners cannot be there to care for them Please help Mail your checks to The Gracie Foundation Main St th Fl Kansas City MO Or donate by credit card by calling DOGS or TREATS Monday thru Friday am to pm CST Thank you in advance for any help whatsoever No gift is too small God bless you and God bless our great country Dan and Mark Founders of Three Dog Bakery This email was sent to PS If youre having second thoughts you can turn tail and unsubscribe to The Tummy Rub Club emails at listssubaspxTDBByU But we sure hope youll stay

RE Southern Company ISDA Master AgreementsI have received Credits comments and will try to turn around comments soon Marie Original Message From Perkins Todd A ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPerkinsCToddAECTAPERKINsoutherncoEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday September AM To Heard Marie Subject RE Southern Company ISDA Master Agreements I still have not received any commentsfeedback on the ISDA Schedule draft forwarded to you on The last time we spoke you said that you were still waiting on some comments from your credit group I would very much like to get the process moving again If there is something I can do to expedite the process please let me know Also please let me know if you have tried to send something to me that hasnt gone through My email address and phone number are below Todd A Perkins Original Message From Perkins Todd A Sent Thursday August AM To Heard Marie Subject Southern Company ISDA Master Agreements We have been working on ISDAs with you for several of our subsidiaries Georgia Power Company Mississippi Power Company Gulf Power Company and Savannah Electric and Power Company Up to this point we have wanted to execute an ISDA for each of these companies Due to the way in which we operate our generation assets as a single system we have decided that we need to change the way in which we enter these ISDAs We would like to execute a single ISDA with you that includes six of our subsidiaries This is how we have entered some of our physical trading contracts In this arrangement the counterparty on Southerns side would be listed as Southern Company Services Inc as agent for Alabama Power Company Georgia Power Company Gulf Power Company Mississippi Power Company Savannah Electric and Power Company and Southern Power Company By using this approach we have more flexibility in entering trades and it provides even stronger credit protection for you since all six of these companies are on the hook Probably the best way to proceed is for you to forward your comments back to me from the last draft I sent to you I will then make the changes to reflect this approach described above and send back to you I look forward to receiving your comments back Please give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Todd A Perkins Original Message From Perkins Todd A Sent Friday July AM To Heard Marie Subject RE Draft ISDA Master Agreements Here are the ISDA Schedules for Georgia Power Mississippi Power and Savannah Electric with our comments Please let me know when you are ready to discuss Todd Perkins Southern Company File FW Master Netting Agreements ReminderPlease see Elizabeths email below Original Message From Sager Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Heard Marie Subject Master Netting Agreements Reminder Reminder If you are working on a Master Netting Agreement you also need to understand what type of entities are being included in the netted group On the power side there are regulatory restrictions on a regulated utility from becoming a guarantor of the debts of unregulated companies accordingly an MNA with a regulated utility and other unaffiliated parties on its side will not work particularly if you are posting collateral on a fully netted basis In this case the only option would be to keep the underlying margining agreements in place no new global collateral annex and have the MNA only be a cross default and acceleration and possible setoff just in case the money is going the right way andor just in case it works Mary is working on a new draft of the MNA to be used if we are not superceding the underlying margining terms Thanks Elizabeth Sager

FW Enron EmailGoldman Sachs Original Message From Bunkin Steven ENRON Sent Monday November PM To St Clair Carol Heard Marie Cc Brogan Michael E Subject FW Enron Email Dear Carol and Marie Following our conversation with Marie and voice mail to Carol we are attaching a version of the Master Netting Agreement that has been revised to reflect our comments and marked to show changes As we indicated we are interested in pursuing implementing the agreement However we are concerned that the crossaffiliate netting provision may not be enforceable This concern has resulted in two important changes that are reflected in the attached markup i we have changed the severability clause to provide that the agreement would survive even if Section is not enforceable and ii we have removed the collateral provisions that are predicated on the operation of crossaffiliate netting Please contact me at the number below or my colleague Mike Brogan with any questions or comments Best regards Steve Bunkin ENRON Master Netting Security Agreementdoc Steven M Bunkin Vice President Associate General Counsel Goldman Sachs Co One New York Plaza th Floor New York New York phone fax ENRON Master Netting Security Agreementdoc

RE EnronBNPP Master Netting Setoff and Security AgreementHarlan Enron Risk Management Trading International Corp is a former name of Enron Capital Trade Resources International Corp Original Message From Murphy Harlan Sent Monday November PM To Heard Marie Subject FW EnronBNPP Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From David C Rosen ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Seth GROSSHANDLER Subject EnronBNPP Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement Dear Harlan The comments below are in addition to and should be read with the hand markup we faxed to you on Friday Notwithstanding that these comments remain subject to the resolution of the business issues we hope to close out as many outstanding items as possible to expedite the final execution of the agreement Please feel free to call me at if you have any questions Yours truly David Rosen Not yet admitted to the bar Temporary Location Information Cleary Gottlieb Steen Hamilton E rd Street Citigroup Center th Floor New York NY Phone Voicemail x Mobile Fax Email Replace Paragraph with This Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement this Agreement is made and entered into effective as of November by and among BNP Paribas including all branches and agencies thereof BNPP BNP Paribas Commodity Futures Inc PFI and BNP Paribas Commodity Futures Limited BNPPCML and Enron Corp Enron Enron North America Corp ENA Enron Power Marketing Inc EPMI Enron Risk Management and Trading International Corp ERMTIC Enron Capital Trade Resources International Corp ECTRIC Enron Credit Limited ECL Enron Metals Limited EML and Enron Capital Trade Resources Limited ECTD Change definition of BNPP Party to means each of BNPP PFI and BNPPCML Change definition of Enron Party to means each of Enron ENA EPMI ECTRIC ERMTIC ECL EML and ECTD In the definition of Transaction insert before the word between i and add at the end the following or ii held at a contract market exchange board of trade or clearing organization by any Party on behalf of a member of the other Group pursuant to an Underlying Master Agreement In Section b in i replace the phrase all Transactions under one or more Underlying Master Agreements with each Transaction In Section b at the end of ii and v before the semicolon insert the following under any other agreement or under applicable law or equity whether in respect of the Transactions thereunder or otherwise In Section b at the end of iii after applicable law insert or equity In Section in the third sentence after the words from whom such payment is due insert the following to such Party or Parties as the Nondefaulting Group determines are entitled to such payment In Section b in each of the forth and the twelfth lines between the words hereby and grants insert except as provided in the next sentence and in each of the ninth and the sixteenth lines replace the text beginning Obligations until the end of each sentence with Obligations Without limiting the rights referred to in Section the security interest granted in the immediately preceding sentence shall not apply to the Final Settlement Amount At the beginning of Sections c and e insert the words Subject to Section In Section b following the words on the basis of a payment owed insert the words including margin With respect to Section our client has indicated that it would not be useful or efficient to have the issue of arbitration which is clearly not central to the risk reducing purposes of the arrangements mixed up with the proposed agreement which has arisen from the circumstances of Enron that have developed over the last few months BNP Paribas primary reason for not wanting to include an arbitration clause even with the suggested language changes is that although the concept of arbitration is being considered generally BNP Paribas has of yet not made any definitive decisions as to the implicit or necessary value of arbitration clauses and such a decision would require significant internal review and discussion Over the next few months further consideration can be given as to including arbitration in this agreement Please note that BNP Paribas contemplates at least one longform confirmation as an Underlying Master Agreement This message is being sent from a law firm and may contain information which is confidential or privileged If you are not the intended recipient please advise the sender immediately by reply email and delete this message and any attachments without retaining a copy

Weve seen many emails regarding the tragedies of last week If youre a Dr Seuss fan this one is done quite well The Binch Every U down in Uville liked US a lot But the Binch who lived Far East of Uville did not The Binch hated US the whole US way Now dont ask me why for nobody can say It could be his turban was screwed on too tight Or the sun from the desert had beaten too bright But I think that the most likely reason of all May have been that his heart was two sizes too small But Whatever the reason his heart or his turban He stood facing Uville the part that was urban Theyre doing their business he snarled from his perch Theyre raising their families Theyre going to church Theyre leading the world and their empire is thriving I MUST keep the Ss and Us from surviving Tomorrow he knew all the Us and the Ss Would put on their pants and their shirts and their dresses Theyd go to their offices playgrounds and schools And abide by their U and S values and rules And then theyd do something he liked least of all Every U down in Uville the tall and the small Would stand all united each U and each S And theyd sing Uvilles anthem God bless us God bless All around their Twin Towers of Uville theyd stand and their voices would drown every sound in the land I must stop that singing Binch said with a smirk And he had an ideaan idea that might work The Binch stole some U airplanes in U morning hours And crashed them right into the Uville Twin Towers Theyll wake to disaster he snickered so sour And how can they sing when they cant find a tower The Binch cocked his ear as they woke from their sleeping All set to enjoy their Uwailing and weeping Instead he heard something that started quite low And it built up quite slow but it started to grow And the Binch heard the most unpredictable thing And he couldnt believe itthey started to sing He stared down at Uville not trusting his eyes What he saw was a shocking disgusting surprise Every U down in Uville the tall and the small Was singing Without any towers at all He HADNT stopped Uville from singing It sung For down deep in the hearts of the old and the young Those Twin Towers were standing called Hope and called Pride And you cant smash the towers we hold deep inside So we circle the sites where our heroes did fall With a hand in each hand of the tall and the small And we mourn for our losses while knowing well cope For we still have inside that UPride and UHope For America means a bit more than tall towers It means more than wealth or political powers Its more than our enemies ever could guess So may God bless America Bless us God bless The service you do for others is the rent you pay for the time you spend on earth

RE Pemex Guaranty Enron Cc Ms Navarro Thank you for sending your comments to the guaranty Please note our comments below Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday September AM To Breslau Craig Ortiz Lucy Heard Marie Cc Subject Pemex Guaranty Enron Lucy Following please find our Corporate Lawyers comments to the changes you requested to the Guaranty we are working on Recitals We do not see why it would be necessary to add that The Guarantor will directly or indirectly benefit from the Transactions between the Beneficiary and PMI Please explain Heard Marie Because i it is a correct statement and ii it clarifies the element of consideration which is essential for purposes of enforceability Section Considering that Pemex normally needs business days to request funds in foreing currencies to the Central Bank we need to change the payment date to be Business Days after receipt of the Payment Demand instead of days Heard Marie We are okay with this change Section Jurisdiction We think that New York Jurisdiction is a good option and probably the most experienced in terms of derivatives trading and therefore we prefer to keep the exclusive jurisdiction of any federal court sitting in the Borough of Manhattan Heard Marie We are okay with the exclusive jurisdiction The rest of your comments are acceptable to us Carlos Riveroll will be sending you PMIs comments to the amendment to the MSA so we can finalize this as soon as posible Best regards Martha Navarro WINMAILDAT File WINMAILDAT

The Chase Manhattan BankWe have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of September between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment i amends the definition of Specified Swap to include foreign exchange spot or foreign exchange forward transactions or currency option transactions ii to specify that The Chase Manhattan Bank is a Multibranch Party and may act through any Office specified in a confirmation and ii to add a Scope of the Agreement provision which states that if the parties enter into a Specified Swap as defined in the master agreement such Specified Swap shall be subject to governed by and construed in accordance with the terms of the agreement unless the confirmation relating thereto specifically states to the contrary In addition we have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of November between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment replaces the definitions of Settlement Amount and Loss as set forth in the master agreement Copies will be distributed

Bank of America NAWe have received an executed Second Amendment to ISDA Master Agreement dated as of October between Bank of America NA and Enron North America Corp which amendment amends the Part cii of the Schedule which states that Bank of America is a multibranch party and may act through the Offices set forth on Appendix A Amendments Copies will be distributed

Morgan Stanley Capital Group IncWe have received an executed Fourth Amendment to Master Energy Price Swap Agreement dated as of October between Enron North America Corp and Morgan Stanley Capital Group Inc which amends the definition of Exposure Threshold Copies will be distributed

Virginia Power Energy Marketing IncWe have received an executed First Amendment to ISDA Master Agreement dated as of September by and between Virginia Power Energy Marketing Inc and Enron North America Corp This first amendment increases the collateral thresholds for both Party A and Party B Copies will be distributed

Subject FW This is hilarious This is wonderful Hope you all get a great chuckle out of it Take all American women who are within five years of menopause train us for a few weeks outfit us with automatic weapons grenades gas masks moisturizer with SPF Prozac hormones chocolate and canned tuna drop us parachuted preferably across the landscape of Afghanistan and let us do what comes naturally Think about it Our anger quotient alone even when doing standard stuff like grocery shopping and paying bills is formidable enough to make evenarmed men in turbans tremble Weve had our children we would gladly suffer or die to protect them and their future Wed like to get away from our husbands if they havent left already And for those of us who are single the prospect of finding a good man with whom to share life is about as likely as being struck by lightning We have nothing to lose Weve survived the water diet the protein diet the carbohydrate diet and the grapefruit diet in gyms and saunas across America and never lost a pound We can easily survive months in the hostile terrain of Afghanistan with no food at all Weve spent years tracking down our husbands or lovers in bars hardware stores or sporting eventsfinding bin Laden in some cave will be no problem Uniting all the warring tribes of Afghanistan in a new government Oh please weve planned the seating arrangements for inlaws and extended families at Thanksgiving dinners for years we understand tribal warfar e Between us weve divorced enough husbands to know every trick there is for how they hide launder or cover up bank accounts and money sources We know how to find that money and we know how to seize it with or without the governments help Let us go and fight The Taliban hates women Imagine their terror as we crawl like ants with hotflashes over their godforsaken terrain Im going to write my Congresswoman You should too

FW Master Netting Agreements ReminderPlease see Elizabeths email below Original Message From Sager Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Heard Marie Subject Master Netting Agreements Reminder Reminder If you are working on a Master Netting Agreement you also need to understand what type of entities are being included in the netted group On the power side there are regulatory restrictions on a regulated utility from becoming a guarantor of the debts of unregulated companies accordingly an MNA with a regulated utility and other unaffiliated parties on its side will not work particularly if you are posting collateral on a fully netted basis In this case the only option would be to keep the underlying margining agreements in place no new global collateral annex and have the MNA only be a cross default and acceleration and possible setoff just in case the money is going the right way andor just in case it works Mary is working on a new draft of the MNA to be used if we are not superceding the underlying margining terms Thanks Elizabeth Sager

Re Ode to the Legal Ladys of Swap and a Sempra Energy Credit WS Cc so proud of you You know that it was so hard for Tana and me to have to point out your shortcomings but it certainly appears that you put a lot of thought into what we said You are still my favorite ENA credit person of course Jane is my favorite EBS credit person Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Marie nroncom Russell nronXgate AM To Tana CT Marie nron Susan CT Stephanie nron cc Subject Ode to the Legal Ladys of Swap and a Sempra Energy Credit WS Dear Legal Ladys I would like to further reinstate my status of favorite Credit Person I know as of late my status had been slipping and I must confess I have no one to blame but myself I want you to know that after a lot of deep thought and pondering of my potential status downgrade I have resolved myself to pull from deep inside and work to maintain my status Although my mates in credit have provided some strong competition to remove me from favorite credit status I am here to tell you that I am committed to remain as your favorite credit person Yours Truly Russell Now that being said my commitment is demonstrated by the submittance of the Sempra Energy Solutions Credit Worksheet Thanks again Russell

FW Master Netting Agreements ReminderPlease see Elizabeths email below Original Message From Sager Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Heard Marie Subject Master Netting Agreements Reminder Reminder If you are working on a Master Netting Agreement you also need to understand what type of entities are being included in the netted group On the power side there are regulatory restrictions on a regulated utility from becoming a guarantor of the debts of unregulated companies accordingly an MNA with a regulated utility and other unaffiliated parties on its side will not work particularly if you are posting collateral on a fully netted basis In this case the only option would be to keep the underlying margining agreements in place no new global collateral annex and have the MNA only be a cross default and acceleration and possible setoff just in case the money is going the right way andor just in case it works Mary is working on a new draft of the MNA to be used if we are not superceding the underlying margining terms Thanks Elizabeth Sager

The Chase Manhattan BankWe have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of September between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment i amends the definition of Specified Swap to include foreign exchange spot or foreign exchange forward transactions or currency option transactions ii to specify that The Chase Manhattan Bank is a Multibranch Party and may act through any Office specified in a confirmation and ii to add a Scope of the Agreement provision which states that if the parties enter into a Specified Swap as defined in the master agreement such Specified Swap shall be subject to governed by and construed in accordance with the terms of the agreement unless the confirmation relating thereto specifically states to the contrary In addition we have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of November between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment replaces the definitions of Settlement Amount and Loss as set forth in the master agreement Copies will be distributed

Bank of America NAWe have received an executed Second Amendment to ISDA Master Agreement dated as of October between Bank of America NA and Enron North America Corp which amendment amends the Part cii of the Schedule which states that Bank of America is a multibranch party and may act through the Offices set forth on Appendix A Amendments Copies will be distributed

Morgan Stanley Capital Group IncWe have received an executed Fourth Amendment to Master Energy Price Swap Agreement dated as of October between Enron North America Corp and Morgan Stanley Capital Group Inc which amends the definition of Exposure Threshold Copies will be distributed

Johns ManvilleWe have received the following executed assignments Assignment and Assumption Agreement dated as of September among Johns Manville Corporation and Johns Manville International Inc and ENA whereby Johns Manville Corporation assigned Deal No VH to Johns Manville International Inc Assignment and Assumption Agreement dated as of September among Johns Manville International Group Inc and Johns Manville International Inc and ENA whereby Johns Manville International Group Inc assigned Deal No QP to Johns Manville International Inc Copies will be distributed

The Chase Manhattan BankWe have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of September between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment i amends the definition of Specified Swap to include foreign exchange spot or foreign exchange forward transactions or currency option transactions ii to specify that The Chase Manhattan Bank is a Multibranch Party and may act through any Office specified in a confirmation and ii to add a Scope of the Agreement provision which states that if the parties enter into a Specified Swap as defined in the master agreement such Specified Swap shall be subject to governed by and construed in accordance with the terms of the agreement unless the confirmation relating thereto specifically states to the contrary In addition we have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated as of November between The Chase Manhattan Bank and Enron North America Corp The amendment replaces the definitions of Settlement Amount and Loss as set forth in the master agreement Copies will be distributed

FW Master Netting Agreements ReminderPlease see Elizabeths email below Original Message From Sager Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Heard Marie Subject Master Netting Agreements Reminder Reminder If you are working on a Master Netting Agreement you also need to understand what type of entities are being included in the netted group On the power side there are regulatory restrictions on a regulated utility from becoming a guarantor of the debts of unregulated companies accordingly an MNA with a regulated utility and other unaffiliated parties on its side will not work particularly if you are posting collateral on a fully netted basis In this case the only option would be to keep the underlying margining agreements in place no new global collateral annex and have the MNA only be a cross default and acceleration and possible setoff just in case the money is going the right way andor just in case it works Mary is working on a new draft of the MNA to be used if we are not superceding the underlying margining terms Thanks Elizabeth Sager
